Pandemonium

Welcome to Pandemonium, a world beyond the valley of the shadow of death. Lands in which there is an endless war for power. It is here that armies of fierce demons and beautiful demonettes clash under the leadership of future lords.

Find us on atomichub

Become the Lord of the Underworld! Pandemonium are original nft cards with varying degrees of rarity, intended for collecting. Limited, unique and hot as hell.

Naiad is the younger demoness of the rivers.It controls the movement of matter. Naiad rules from the waters of the Styx to the Great Lava Flow of the Underworld. She loves good jokes. Attention! Beauty Naiad can burn you with one glance.

Join our telegram channel

Your time has come!

Become the strongest hero of Pandemonium by subscribing to our telegram channel! News, events and special offers are waiting for you!

This is just the beginning. We're releasing the first batch of our limited edition cards with Pretty Naiad.

roadmap

We create characters and a pre–release pack with a cute demon that should charm you

Depending on the pre–release, we will choose one of the development strategies and release several new original collections using stacking

We expect Pandemonium cards to be used for staking in all our future project

about us

We are a young team united by common interests and game development, with rich experience in the mobile market. Our project is a fantasy meta–universe with references to things we all love, bulit on a blockchain system using original NFT cards.

our story

In June 2021, a group of programmers and designers already working on mobile games turned their eyes to the blockchain system. It turns out that each of us buy Nft cards for collecting or played blockchain games. Games cannot develop without technology, and technology is well promoted through games. We have all the potential to create new intresting products with the lastest technology.

our mission

The priority for us is to use and popularize modern technologies and create games. We believe that the blockchain system is the future.
